scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.audit:all: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n BACK,FRONT -c green,cyan "npm run dev --workspace backend" "npm run dev --workspace frontend"
